# sparseNumeric

`sparseNumeric` implements an S4 class for sparse numeric vectors and
provides arithmetic, norms, and standardization using the sparse
representation.

```r
library(sparseNumeric)

v <- c(0, 4, 3.2, 0, 6.1)
x <- as(v, "sparse_numeric")

x
mean(x)
norm(x)
xs <- standardize(x)
as(xs, "numeric")
